name: Twitch
author: Aidle
description: Streams chat events and channel notifications from Twitch in mock mode.

triggers.name: Chat Message
triggers.description: Fires when a chat message is received.

triggers.name: New Follower
triggers.description: Fires when the channel gains a follower.

triggers.name: New Subscription
triggers.description: Fires on a new subscription or resubscription.

actions.name: Send Chat Message
actions.description: Send a message to Twitch chat.

actions.name: Send Shoutout
actions.description: Send a shoutout to another channel.
